titles.title: Nothing can separate me from your love

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nothing can separate me
from your love
Oh Lord no be lie
Say na only you change
my life uh uh eh
Your love is unfakeable
blessings are uncountable
Everything that you do Lord
I can not tell it all
Let me count.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Everything has changed
E don change o
E don change, oh-oh-oh
Everything has changed
E don change o
E don change, oh-oh-oh
In the name of Jesus
In the name of Jesus
I can never be the
same again

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Glory be to Your name o
To Your name
To Your name, oh-oh
Adoration to Your name o
To Your name
To Your name

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In the name of Jesus
(settled)
In the name of Jesus
(settled)
In the name of Jesus
I can never be the
same again
